column5: Home is near Mopac (Loop 1) for quick access to downtown and SXSW - 12 minutes and the airport -25 minutes. Nice neighborhood with lots of trees near Alamo Drafthouse, several local restaurants, Dick Nichol's Park, the veloway and Wildflower center. I also have a 2nd bedroom called the South Austin Niche. I own a cat and a dog.
